title: Bitter Script
content:
Hello guys,

anybody knows this script??

As always, thanks in advance.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140830190439im_/http:/typophile.com/files/bitter_4717.jpg)
author: dust

comments.content:
Come on guys no one?

I can't believe it! ;)

I have a feeling that 'r' is not original to the font, otherwise it's very similar to a number of scripts.

- Lex
Closest I saw was Snell Rounded, but either way, it has to be pretty modified to be close.
Thanks for your input guys, apreciatte it
